title: JeetWin Pro Website Redesign with Casino Theme and Hero Banners

requirements.summary: Create full-page layout with navigation, hero section, game categories, promotional banners, featured games grid, and footer
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar is present with logo, login and register CTAs
Page sections match the general layout of jeet-win.live
Footer includes relevant links and legal disclaimer text

file_operations.description: Update App component to render the main page layout structure including Navigation, Hero, Categories, Games, Promotions, and Footer sections
Create Navigation component with logo, center nav links, and Login/Register buttons on the right
Create Hero section component container for the carousel slider
Create Categories section component container for the games/sports category tabs
Create FeaturedGames section component to display the game cards grid
Create Promotions section component to display promotional offer cards
Create Footer component with Quick Links, Games, Support columns, social media icons, and legal disclaimer

requirements.summary: Apply premium casino theme with gold, deep black, and crimson red color palette with glowing accents and bold typography
acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors are gold (#FFD700), deep black (#0A0A0A), and crimson red (#C0132F)
Typography is bold and high-contrast throughout
Glowing neon-style accents are applied to buttons, cards, and section headings
Theme is consistent across navigation, hero, cards, and footer

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors: gold (#FFD700), deepBlack (#0A0A0A), crimsonRed (#C0132F), and configure box-shadow utilities for glowing effects
Add global CSS for premium casino aesthetics including bold font weights, glowing text shadows, neon button effects, and dark background gradients using the gold/black/red palette

requirements.summary: Build full-width auto-playing hero carousel with 5 banner slides featuring headline, subheadline, CTA button, navigation arrows, and dot indicators
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width
Auto-plays through at least 5 banner images
Each slide has headline, subheadline, and CTA button
Navigation arrows and dot indicators are visible and functional
Transitions are smooth (fade or slide animation)

file_operations.description: Create HeroCarousel component with auto-play, 5 slides using generated banner images (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner-1.dim_1920x700.jpg through hero-banner-5.dim_1920x700.jpg), navigation arrows, dot indicators, and smooth transitions. Each slide includes headline, subheadline, and CTA button overlay
Create useCarousel hook to manage carousel state, auto-play timer, navigation handlers, and slide transitions
Update Hero section to render HeroCarousel component

requirements.summary: Display horizontal scrollable category tab bar with icons and labels for Cricket, Football, Casino, Slots, Live Casino, Card Games, Lottery that filters game cards
acceptanceCriteria: Category tabs are horizontally scrollable on smaller screens
Each tab has an icon and label
Active tab is visually highlighted in gold
Selecting a tab filters the game grid accordingly

file_operations.description: Create CategoryTabs component with horizontal scrollable tab bar displaying Cricket, Football, Casino, Slots, Live Casino, Card Games, Lottery categories with icons and labels. Active tab highlighted in gold. Clicking a tab updates selected category state
Update Categories section to render CategoryTabs component and manage selected category state, passing it to FeaturedGames for filtering
Wire category selection state between Categories and FeaturedGames sections to enable filtering

requirements.summary: Create featured games grid with responsive cards showing game banner image, title, and Play Now button using AI-generated thumbnails
acceptanceCriteria: Game cards are displayed in a responsive grid (2 cols mobile, 4 cols desktop)
Each card has a banner image, title, and 'Play Now' CTA
Cards have hover effects (scale + glow)
AI-generated images are used as card thumbnails

file_operations.description: Create GameCard component displaying game thumbnail image, title, and Play Now button with hover scale and glow effects using the gold/red theme

Update FeaturedGames section to render responsive grid (2 cols mobile, 4 cols desktop) of GameCard components using generated game images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (game-slots.dim_400x300.jpg, game-poker.dim_400x300.jpg, game-cricket.dim_400x300.jpg, game-football.dim_400x300.jpg, game-baccarat.dim_400x300.jpg, game-lottery.dim_400x300.jpg). Filter cards based on selected category from Categories section
Create games data file containing array of game objects with id, title, category, and image path properties for all 6 game types

requirements.summary: Add promotional offers section with 3 offer cards showing banner image, title, description, and Claim Now button
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 promotional offer cards are displayed
Each card has an image, title, description, and CTA button
Cards use the gold/red/black theme with glowing borders

file_operations.description: Create PromoCard component displaying promotional banner image, offer title, description text, and Claim Now button with glowing gold borders and hover effects

Update Promotions section to render 3 PromoCard components using generated promotional images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (promo-welcome.dim_600x300.jpg for Welcome Bonus 200%, promo-refer.dim_600x300.jpg for Refer a Friend, promo-cashback.dim_600x300.jpg for Daily Cashback)
Create promotions data file containing array of 3 promotional offers with id, title, description, and image path properties

requirements.summary: Render all AI-generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated in hero slider, game cards, and promotional banners
acceptanceCriteria: All image tags reference paths under /assets/generated/
Images load correctly in all sections
No broken image links

file_operations.description: Verify all hero banner image src attributes reference the exact generated file paths: /assets/generated/hero-banner-1.dim_1920x700.jpg, /assets/generated/hero-banner-2.dim_1920x700.jpg, /assets/generated/hero-banner-3.dim_1920x700.jpg, /assets/generated/hero-banner-4.dim_1920x700.jpg, /assets/generated/hero-banner-5.dim_1920x700.jpg

Verify all game image paths reference the exact generated file paths: /assets/generated/game-slots.dim_400x300.jpg, /assets/generated/game-poker.dim_400x300.jpg, /assets/generated/game-cricket.dim_400x300.jpg, /assets/generated/game-football.dim_400x300.jpg, /assets/generated/game-baccarat.dim_400x300.jpg, /assets/generated/game-lottery.dim_400x300.jpg

Verify all promotional image paths reference the exact generated file paths: /assets/generated/promo-welcome.dim_600x300.jpg, /assets/generated/promo-refer.dim_600x300.jpg, /assets/generated/promo-cashback.dim_600x300.jpg

requirements.summary: Implement sticky top navigation with logo, center nav links, Login/Register buttons, and mobile hamburger menu
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is sticky and visible on scroll
Logo is on the left
Login and Register buttons are on the right with distinct styling
Mobile hamburger menu toggles the nav links

file_operations.description: Update Navigation component to be sticky (fixed position), display JeetWin Pro logo on left, center navigation links (Home, Sports, Casino, Promotions, About), Login and Register buttons on right with gold/crimson styling, and hamburger menu for mobile that toggles nav links visibility
Create useMobileMenu hook to manage mobile menu open/close state and toggle handler

requirements.summary: Create footer with Quick Links, Games, Support columns, social media icons, and legal disclaimer using dark background with gold accent text
acceptanceCriteria: Footer has at least 3 link columns
Social media icons are displayed
Legal disclaimer text is present
Footer uses the dark/gold theme

file_operations.description: Update Footer component to display 3 columns (Quick Links, Games, Support with Contact Us/FAQ/Responsible Gaming), social media icons row, and legal disclaimer text. Use dark background (#0A0A0A) with gold (#FFD700) accent text and links
Create footer data file containing link arrays for Quick Links, Games, and Support sections plus social media icon configurations
